member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_ENTRY
member.summary: The OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_ENTRY structure contains the current certificate status for a single certificate. This structure populates the rgResponseEntry member.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_ENTRY.CertId
member.summary: An structure that specifies the target certificate of the online certificate status protocol (OCSP) response.

summary.para: A value that indicates the target certificate revocation status.
RFC 2560 defines the following possible values for certificate status.

listheader.description: The certificate is revoked either permanently or temporarily.
The responder has no information for the target certificate.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_ENTRY.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pRevokedInfo
member.summary: A pointer to an structure that specifies the reason the target certificate was revoked.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_ENTRY.ThisUpdate
member.summary: The date and time at which the response indicated by dwCertStatus is known to be correct.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_ENTRY.NextUpdate
member.summary: The date and time on or before which newer information will be available for the certificate status. A value of zero indicates that the certificate status never expires.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_ENTRY.cExtension
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgExtension array.

member.name: OCSP_BASIC_RESPONSE_ENTRY.rgExtension
member.summary: An array of pointers to structures, each of which contains additional information about the response.
